title: I can tell you what all the new talon players will look like
body:
http://i.imgur.com/XFKX0vc.gif

1 like = 1 less game of a bad talon on your team

1 comment = At least 1 up vote to your counter because it counts yourself

replies.body:
When you want to impress your friends in mastering new Talon:

https://media.giphy.com/media/828PKid90j2ik/giphy.gif
I think this one is better than op's... xD
it only happens if a {{champion:14}}  on an enemy team
Jokes on you, every one of my games will have a bad Talon player in it: Me.

Then people understand Talon and 
https://www.facebook.com/EarthPixPage/videos/1165266103511439/

he is going to get nerfed to hell just like Taliyah or TF
Ugh, just seeing that scared me. I hate heights.
I nearly vomited, skipped near end whether he'll jump down or whatnot and quickly closed it.
same here.
http://i.imgur.com/PyWwcnN.gif?noredirect
My face the whole video.
Watched this in a public area and I was asked if I was okay I was shaking so much

*pats*
honestly i didn't feel anything since we used to do similar stuff when we were kids, minus jumping due to little space

but yeh, that's how its gona be when people master talon. Others would be like wtfffff and then he will get tons of nerfs instead of adding a cooldown or cost on his E
That's a whole lot of brave and stupid.
Depending on your perspective, there's either a very fine line or an entire skyscraper's worth of distance between the two.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zNiekjk3u2Q

this was my first thought when i saw the update
#PARKOUR!
Video blocked in us, Rip

Which is ridiculous, because I'm pretty sure this is one scene, which solidly puts it under the Fair Use clause of the Digital Media Law.

But then again, it's NBC, so...
sad for us Canadians, these America don't want us to see this
How does one give out a "like", good sir? Teach me your ways - for I would very much enjoy few games of bad talon teammates!
Gotta agree with this, I've mained him for 4 years and even I have trouble getting him to work, he's a lot more challenging now.
Accurate, because Talon can't leap over Brush, only impassable terrain.
i can stand the humiliation if it means i get to do parkour
